entries.name: Archmage Aethas Sunreaver

traits.name: Time Warp
traits.effect: Briefly accelerates allies’ actions.

traits.name: Entropy Surge
traits.effect: Unleashes a focused fel-arcane blast at range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Veilshot Step
traits.effect: Blink between shadowed cover; gains advantage on the next shot.

traits.name: Arcane Drain
traits.effect: Saps the mana from a target, Weakening them for a turn.

traits.name: Arcane Bolt
traits.effect: Strikes enemies with a more precise bolt raw arcane power with a +1 to hit chance.

entries.description: Figurehead of the Sunreavers and a canny political actor. Equally at home in a war council or a mage conclave.

entries.name: Archmage Khadgar

traits.name: Arcane Pulse
traits.effect: A flashing pulse that clings to the target and damages nearby enemies for several turns.

traits.name: Void Rift
traits.effect: Summons a portal that disrupts terrain briefly.

traits.name: Escape Portal
traits.effect: Phase out of danger once per encounter.

traits.name: Arcane Defection
traits.effect: Turns enemy caster wards against their owners.

traits.name: Magister's Portalworks
traits.effect: Establishes arcane links for rapid redeployments.

entries.description: A steady hand of the Kirin Tor—mediator, problem-solver, and veteran of world-shaping crises.

entries.name: Banshee Queen Sylvanas Windrunner

traits.name: Broadside Cannons
traits.effect: Unleashes devastating synchronized volleys.

traits.name: Focused Cast
traits.effect: A narrowly focused spellcast with a much higher chance of striking the target.

traits.name: Rapid Fire
traits.effect: Unleashes quick volleys of arrows.

traits.name: Barrage
traits.effect: Unleashes a flurry of shots at a group of enemies, dealing hit damage to all targets.

traits.name: Spear Volley
traits.effect: Throw all remaining spears in rapid succession, pinning and rooting enemies or dealing damage.

entries.description: Legendary ranger-general of Quel'Thalas who was slain defending Silvermoon against the Scourge. Raised into undeath by Prince Arthas, she has been tormented by her curse ever since.

entries.name: Blood Knight Talthis

traits.name: Arcane Aegis
traits.effect: Wards dampen magical assaults for a short time, protecting allies from spell damage.

traits.name: Fel Rend
traits.effect: Tears through magical wards.

traits.name: Desert Blessing
traits.effect: Shields an ally with spiritual power and heals them when damaged.

traits.name: Blessing of Feathers
traits.effect: Nearby harpies resist damage briefly.

entries.description: A hard-edged trainer and field captain whose standards are as uncompromising as his guard.

entries.name: Captain Auric Sunchaser

traits.name: Rift Implosion
traits.effect: Collapses a Void Rift to create a gravity well, sucking all enemies towards it.

traits.name: Lunar Blessing
traits.effect: Lunar blessings protect against incoming damage for one turn.

traits.name: Hammer of the Naaru
traits.effect: Strikes with radiant force.

traits.name: Blessing of Elune
traits.effect: Empowers allies with holy lunar radiance.

traits.name: Draconic Crash
traits.effect: Descends rapidly from the sky and slams into the ground, throwing everyone nearby backwards and stunning them, leaving them vulnerable.

entries.description: High elven captain and visible standard-bearer for the Silver Covenant’s honor.

entries.name: Dark Ranger Velonara

traits.name: Barrage
traits.effect: Unleashes a flurry of shots at a group of enemies, dealing hit damage to all targets.

traits.name: Spear Volley
traits.effect: Throw all remaining spears in rapid succession, pinning and rooting enemies or dealing damage.

entries.description: A pragmatic dark ranger accustomed to hard choices; her aid comes with sharp conditions.

traits.name: Explosive Charge
traits.effect: Throws unstable bombs.

traits.effect: Interlocks shields to soften incoming harm.

traits.name: Diplomatic Shield
traits.effect: Reduces fallout from faction incidents in cities.

traits.name: Shield Warders
traits.effect: Elven magi protect the ship from incoming fire, deflecting attacks.

entries.description: A magistrix near the Silvermoon gates in Eversong Woods. Stationed at Eversong Woods.

entries.name: Magistrix Phaelista

traits.name: Arcane Pulse
traits.effect: A flashing pulse that clings to the target and damages nearby enemies for several turns.

traits.name: Arcane Bolt
traits.effect: Strikes enemies with a more precise bolt raw arcane power with a +1 to hit chance.

traits.name: Entropy Surge
traits.effect: Unleashes a focused fel-arcane blast at range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Arcane Purge
traits.effect: Dispels magical effects benefiting the target.

entries.description: A Sunreaver magister affiliated with the Kirin Tor in Dalaran. Stationed at Dalaran.

entries.name: Magistrix Saia

traits.name: Arcane Purge
traits.effect: Dispels magical effects benefiting the target.

traits.name: Gateway Conjuration
traits.effect: Opens tactical portals for rapid redeployments or retreats.

traits.name: Arcane Lash
traits.effect: Strikes with mana-hardened force, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Interdict
traits.effect: Interrupts teleportation and planar travel in a radius.

entries.description: A Sunreaver magister affiliated with the Kirin Tor in Dalaran. Stationed at Dalaran.

entries.name: Matriarch Lady Liadrin

traits.name: Storm Ward
traits.effect: Protects an ally from ranged attacks briefly.

traits.name: Ancestral Blessing
traits.effect: Bolsters allies with ancient power and a +1 advantage.

traits.name: Ward Script
traits.effect: Enables sight of trespassers stepping through wards.

traits.name: Guardian’s Ward
traits.effect: Nearby allies resist knockback briefly.

traits.name: Void Ward
traits.effect: Absorbs attacks until overwhelmed, and then unleashes that damage in an explosion.

entries.description: Leader of the Blood Knights, tempered by hard truths and renewed purpose. A rallying presence on any battlefield.

entries.name: Mehlar Dawnblade

traits.name: Blessing of Odyn
traits.effect: Grants nearby allies extra resilience, granting +1 to all rolls next round.

traits.name: Greedy Command
traits.effect: Nearby allies fight harder if promised reward.

traits.name: Storm Ward
traits.effect: Protects an ally from ranged attacks briefly.

entries.description: A driven Blood Knight whose past trials in the Ghostlands shaped an unflinching sense of duty.

entries.name: Ranger-Captain Alleria Windrunner

traits.name: Shadow Volley
traits.effect: Unleashes a deadly volley of shadow bolts.

traits.name: Void Trueshot
traits.effect: Arrows tear through veils and illusions.

traits.name: Spear Volley
traits.effect: Throw all remaining spears in rapid succession, pinning and rooting enemies or dealing damage.

traits.name: Cannon Shot
traits.effect: Long ranged cannon shot that weakens fortifications.

traits.name: Moonlit Arrow
traits.effect: Harms enemies over several turns and prevents them from concealing themselves.

entries.description: Legendary ranger, tempered by the Void but unbroken by it. A bridge between high elven traditions and new shadowed arts.

entries.name: Ranger-Captain Venn'ren

traits.name: Crude Rifle
traits.effect: Fires inaccurate but powerful shots.

traits.name: Silencing Arrow
traits.effect: Briefly disrupts spellcasting and calls for aid.

traits.name: Black Arrow
traits.effect: Arrows tainted with dark magic that linger, draining the target's health.

traits.name: Adamant Frame
traits.effect: Massive plating shrugs off punishing strikes, preventing puncturing hits like Aimed Shot.

entries.description: Pragmatic Farstrider captain who keeps outposts alive with grit and triage.

entries.name: Ranger-General Halduron Brightwing

traits.name: Bone Arrow
traits.effect: Splintering shafts that embed and ache, causing Bleeding.

traits.name: Veilshot Step
traits.effect: Blink between shadowed cover; gains advantage on the next shot.

traits.name: Obelisk Ward
traits.effect: Raises a runic ward that dulls volleys.

traits.name: Cannon Shot
traits.effect: Long ranged cannon shot that weakens fortifications.

traits.name: Aimed Shot
traits.effect: Ignores all armor and line of sight barriers to deal heavy damage.

entries.description: Commander of the Farstriders. Keeps the borders secure with crisp orders and sharper arrows.

entries.name: Ranger-General Vereesa Windrunner

traits.name: Blackrock Cannons
traits.effect: Spews rapid-fire barrages of cannon shot.

traits.name: Obelisk Ward
traits.effect: Raises a runic ward that dulls volleys.

traits.effect: Ignores all armor and line of sight barriers to deal heavy damage.

traits.effect: Arrows tear through veils and illusions.

traits.name: Spear Volley
traits.effect: Throw all remaining spears in rapid succession, pinning and rooting enemies or dealing damage.

entries.description: Leader of the Silver Covenant. Defends high elven dignity with a commander’s clarity and a mother’s ferocity.

entries.name: Regent Lord Lor'themar Theron

traits.name: Aimed Shot
traits.effect: Ignores all armor and line of sight barriers to deal heavy damage.

traits.name: Poisoned Arrow
traits.effect: Inflicts poison condition on a target.

traits.name: Coordinated Fire
traits.effect: Coordinated volleys stagger enemy lines, adding +1 damage done for all allies who join the effort firing at the target.

traits.name: Spellbane Arrow
traits.effect: Shots disrupt enemy spellcasting briefly.

traits.name: Cannon Shot
traits.effect: Long ranged cannon shot that weakens fortifications.

entries.description: Regent Lord of Quel'Thalas. A measured statesman and veteran ranger, balancing Silvermoon's politics with the realm’s defense.

entries.name: Tharessa Sunstrand

traits.name: Thorn Shield
traits.effect: Damage dealt back when struck in melee.

traits.name: Shield Bash
traits.effect: Bashes enemy, inflicting Off-Balance and interrupting their spells.

traits.name: Anima Surge
traits.effect: Discharges anima in a destabilizing burst that rapidly spreads.

traits.name: Shield Warders
traits.effect: Elven magi protect the ship from incoming fire, deflecting attacks.

entries.description: A polished magistrix who moves easily between courtly halls and field camps as Silvermoon’s envoy.

entries.name: Valeera Sanguinar

traits.name: Fumes
traits.effect: Enemies adjacent at round start take minor poison damage.

traits.name: Prowl
traits.effect: Conceals or reduces chance to be targeted.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.effect: Essential for effective stealth, conceal yourself with what's available nearby.

traits.name: Bone Breaker
traits.effect: Cripples enemies with crushing blows, dealing heavy damage and stunning them for two turns.

entries.description: A deft blade and deft diplomat, moving between worlds as easily as between shadows.

entries.name: Voren'thal the Seer

traits.name: Erratic Gizmos
traits.effect: Devices malfunction and jam up, stunning the entity.

traits.name: Chill of the Grave
traits.effect: Cold touch that saps warmth and slows the body.

traits.name: Blood Rites
traits.effect: Channels power from sacrifices.

traits.name: Grave Tempest
traits.effect: A roar that spills hoarfrost and bone splinters across the field.

traits.name: Blood Pact
traits.effect: Sacrifices HP to empower allies.

entries.description: Vision-touched leader whose defection reshaped allegiances. Values redemption and hard choices.
